sourcesContent:
import img1 from '../../assets/img/blog/post1.png'
import img2 from '../../assets/img/blog/post2.png'
import img3 from '../../assets/img/blog/post3.png'
import img4 from '../../assets/img/blog/post4.png'
import img5 from '../../assets/img/blog/post5.png'
import img6 from '../../assets/img/blog/post6.png'
import img7 from '../../assets/img/blog/post7.png'
import img8 from '../../assets/img/blog/post8.png'
import img9 from '../../assets/img/blog/post9.png'

export const BlogData = [
    {
        img: img1,
        date: "24 February 2021",
        title: `The Luxury Winter Accessory That’s Trending Now`,
        para: `No matter what you spend on your wardrobe, there are three pieces that can
    always elevate your look – shoes, handbags, and sunglasses.`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img2,
        date: "29 jan 2018",
        title: `4 Fresh Ways To Style Leather Shorts For Spring`,
        para: ` We spent spring break this year in California with Cody’s family and it
     was such a fun getaway. Cody’s family always goes hard on vacation`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img3,
        date: "14 February 2021",
        title: `Shopbop Spring Sale Selects (All Under/Around $100!)`,
        para: `STRAIGHT LEG DENIM (UNDER $100) – Love all the Ribcage Levi’s styles!
     They are all really flattering. but since these are wider leg I stuck with my usual size (25).`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img4,
        date: "4 June 2021",
        title: `This Made Me Splurge on The Apple Watch`,
        para: `From our favourite UK influencers to the best missives from Milan and the coolest New Yorkers,
     read on some of the best fashion blogs out there.`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img5,
        date: "24 August 2021",
        title: `This Designer Bronzer Has Even Buyers Splurging!`,
        para: `Today kicks off early access to the Sephora Spring Sales Event so I wanted to share 
    some of my top recent beauty buys`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img6,
        date: "17 February 2021",
        title: `4 Tips for A Colorful Easter Tablescape`,
        para: `Spring is all about the colors! Especially after what feels like an endless winter, I catch myself
     craving more color than usual.`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img7,
        date: "24 February 2021",
        title: `Hawaii Couples Trip Guide and Spring Break Faves`,
        para: `After every trip to Hawaii, I always have a few DMs asking where we stayed, our favorite beaches, 
    etc. Especially with spring break around the corner.`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img8,
        date: "24 February 2021",
        title: `If You Struggle To Hit Your Goals, Try This Instead`,
        para: `This year, instead of setting grand, lofty goals and New Years Resolutions, I realized that 
    I respond better to smaller targets that I can cross`,
        button: "Read More"
    },
    {
        img: img9,
        date: "24 February 2021",
        title: `The Luxury Winter Accessory That’s Trending Now`,
        para: `No matter what you spend on your wardrobe, there are three pieces that can always elevate your 
    look – shoes, handbags, and sunglasses.`,
        button: "Read More"
    }

]
